name: Indira Gandhi National Disability Pension Scheme
description: Provides financial assistance to persons with disabilities from low-income families.

name: Post Matric Scholarship for Students with Disabilities
description: Scholarship support for students with disabilities pursuing higher education.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: Affordable housing scheme for economically weaker sections.

name: National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGA)
description: Provides guaranteed wage employment to rural households.
